name: GITEX GLOBAL Dubai
description: GITEX GLOBAL Dubai is one of the worldâ€™s largest and most influential technology exhibitions and conferences, held annually at the Dubai World Trade Centre. It brings together industry leaders, innovators, startups, investors, and government representatives from around the globe to showcase advancements in AI, cloud computing, cybersecurity, fintech, blockchain, robotics, IoT, and more. GITEX GLOBAL sets the stage for major product launches, transformative partnerships, and discussions that help shape the future of the global technology landscape, with over 200,000 attendees and thousands of exhibitors each year. :contentReference[oaicite:0]{index=0}
